backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor file serving as a placeholder for backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for the Verisure retention script interface, including diagnosis screens, navigation branches, and detailed script views with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their roles in the Verisure retention script application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the application, including chart colors for script sections.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Verisure Retention Script Tool application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component rendering header, footer with caffeine.ai attribution, and ScriptNavigator component within a responsive container layout.
frontend/src/components/Breadcrumb.tsx: Breadcrumb navigation component displaying the current path through the script hierarchy with clickable items and chevron separators.
Initial diagnosis screen component displaying the main question card and three primary category buttons (FINA, UNHAPPY, NO USE) for navigation.
frontend/src/components/RefinementScreen: Refinement screen component showing subcategory questions with navigation buttons and back functionality for drilling down into script branches.
frontend/src/components/ScriptDetailView: Detailed script view component displaying color-coded sections (diagnosis, questions, reframing, solution, closing) with icons for each script element.
Main navigation controller managing state, path tracking, and conditional rendering of diagnosis, refinement, or detail views based on current position in the script tree.
frontend/src/data/scriptData.ts: Defines the complete hierarchical script data structure for Verisure retention conversations in Dutch, with branching paths for financial (FINA), dissatisfaction (UNHAPPY), and non-usage (NO USE) scenarios, each containing diagnosis questions, follow-ups, reframing, and solution scripts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for the application, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with support for derivation origins.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system including light/dark themes, color palettes (primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive), sidebar styling, and chart colors using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up the React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/types/script.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the script navigation system, defining ScriptNode interface with hierarchical structure (id, title, questions, diagnosis, solution, children) and NavigationPath for breadcrumb tracking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, container settings, Inter font family, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting the Verisure retention call center script tool, listing implemented features for the interactive decision tree interface with Dutch language support and multi-level branching navigation across financial, dissatisfaction, and non-usage conversation paths.
